ceo_buyer.justification: The document mentions Alicia Milne as CEO, but this is in the context of the acquisition of the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The acquisition of 100% of claims mentioned in the text relates to the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

currency.justification: The document's currency context (CAD) is tied to the acquisition of the 'Stellar Lithium Property' and general company information, not a transaction for the Big Hill project.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The payment mentioned ('cost of staking') was for the acquisition of the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

share_payments_raw.justification: The document does not mention a share payment for any transaction. The main transaction discussed is for the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No combined payment value is mentioned. The transaction in the document is for the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The document does not state any shares were issued for an acquisition. The main transaction is for the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so there is no issue price. The main transaction is for the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The '10,000 m inaugural drilling campaign' mentioned is explicitly for the 'Mia Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment is mentioned for any project in the document.

exploration_commitment_desc.justification: The exploration plans detailed ('geophysical surveys', 'detailed mapping and sampling') are for the 'Mia Lithium Property' and 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No NSR acquisition is mentioned for any project in the document.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The 3,972 hectares mentioned were acquired as part of the 'Stellar Lithium Property' deal, not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The area unit 'hectares' is associated with the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not the Big Hill project. This data is ignored per the Data Relevance rule.

resource_size_desc.justification: The document mentions grades for the 'Mia Lithium project' (0.47% Li2O and 2.27% Li2O) but provides no resource statement for the Big Hill project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The ticker 'TSXV:QTWO' is for Q2 Metals, but it is mentioned in the context of their acquisition of the 'Stellar Lithium Property', not a transaction for the Big Hill project.
